title: mm怪物不攻击人
author: Cat_Miao丶
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Cat_Miao丶 于 2019-10-8 23:58 编辑 

鸡:
  Type: chicken
  Display: '&7&l[&a鸡&7&l]'
  Health: 10
  Damage: 3
  LegacySkills: 
  Drops: 
  - yumao 1 1
  - jirou 1 0.5
  Equipment: 
  Options: 
    AlwaysShowName: true
    MovementSpeed: 0
    Disguise:
    Type: mob
    mob: Zombie
打了一下鸡 鸡就是死活不打人(有伪装插件

replies.author: 向井户爱花
replies.txt_content:
给怪物添加AI应该可以，格式如下
鸡:
  Type: chicken
  Display: '&7&l[&a鸡&7&l]'
  Health: 10
  Damage: 3
  AIGoalSelectors:
  - 0 clear
  - 1 meleeattack
  - 2 randomstroll
  AITargetSelectors:
  - 0 clear
  - 1 players
  - 2 golems
  LegacySkills: 
  Drops: 
  - yumao 1 1
  - jirou 1 0.5
  Equipment: 
  Options: 
    AlwaysShowName: true
    MovementSpeed: 0复制代码

replies.author: 大海Sea
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 972063175 于 2019-10-9 07:56 编辑 

你弄个僵尸然后伪装成鸡样就可以攻击人了
鸡:
  Type: zombie
  Display: '&7&l[&a鸡&7&l]'
  Health: 10
  Damage: 3
  Disguise:
    Type: chichen
  LegacySkills: 
  Drops: 
  - yumao 1 1
  - jirou 1 0.5
  Equipment: 
  Options: 
    AlwaysShowName: true
    MovementSpeed: 0

replies.txt_content:

  Type: zombie
改了之后怪物变成了玩家 显示id Ashijinmm版本 4.6.5

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Kafeix.cn
replies.txt_content: 你先设置怪物的模型是会攻击人的怪物 在伪装成鸡就可以了
